titles: Epicedium nobilissimi et inclyti herois, Dni Roberti Deverux comitis Essexiæ et Ewe, Vice-comitis Herefordiæ, Baronis Ferrers de Chartley, Bourchier et Lovaine, Copiarum Comitialium pro Religione & Libertate patrie desudantium summi ducis; qui terris relictis in cœlum rediit; Anno redempti generis humani 1646 Septembris die 14. Ætatis fue 57.
author: Nisbet, John, Scoto-Britannus.
notes: Verse: "Attonitas vario strepitu quid distrahit aures?"...
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Essex, Robert Devereux, --  Earl of, 1591-1646 --  Poetry.
